trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around March 15th 2008
Summary: Large star sort of like a planet
divs: Sighting DetailsLight about 20 degrees above horizon toward the north west. changeing colors in a regular pattern.Never moved from that position.I finally got tired and cold and went to bed.My wife looked a while later the light was in the same location. I checked the following night it was in the same location it never moved from that location.The stars and planets moved across the sky the light never changed position.Went out to look about 30 minutes later it was gone.The following morning at 5am it was there same spot same light same sort of ossilateing not like atmospheric distortion.Ive never seen any thing like this before.
